newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Philips in talks on Indonesia telecoms.
newsitem.headline: Philips in talks on Indonesia telecoms.

text.p: Europe's largest consumer electronics company, Philips Electronics NV is in talks with the Indonesian government over entry into that country's telecoms market, a spokeswoman said on Thursday.
"We are having discussions at the the highest level in Indonesia," she said.
She confirmed the talks included the possibility of Philips building a mobile telephone factory in Indonesia, but said discussions were at a preliminary stage and could not give further details.
Philips has high ambitions in the field of consumer telecoms, aiming to be one of the top three global players by the end of the century.
"Asia is very important to us in terms of that strategy," the spokeswoman said. -- Amsterdam newsroom +31 20 504 5000, Fax +31 20 504 5040
